articles.summary: Time tracking has a bad reputation, it invokes images of managers watching over your shoulder or pay being docked as you punched in minutes before your shift ended. Due to these, and many more, if you suggest to someone to start tracking their time they’re likely to look at you like you’ve gone mad.
articles.title: The case for time-tracking

articles.summary: Kubernetes networking can be a bit of a rabbit hole to debug and discover what your pods are actually doing. In this post we’ll explore at a high level how a request goes from 1 pod to another and which components control each.
articles.title: Kubernetes Networking #1

articles.title: Blog² - Blog about blogs

articles.summary: This is a workflow to debug common Kubernetes problems when deploying applications.
articles.title: Kubernetes Debugging
